title: Splitt.ink
description: Splitt.ink is a user-friendly online tool designed to help you split bills and manage group expenses effortlessly. Whether you’re on a trip, dining out with friends, or organizing a group event, Splitt.ink makes it easy to ensure everyone pays their fair share. With features like no registration required, multiple currencies, automatic calculations, and debt settlement, Splitt.ink simplifies expense tracking and minimizes confusion around shared bills.
